mapper.insert: INSERT INTO transaction (tran_no, prod_no, buyer_id, payment_option, receiver_name, receiver_phone, dlvy_addr, dlvy_request, tran_status_code, order_date, dlvy_date) VALUES( seq_transaction_tran_no.nextval, #{purchaseProd.prodNo:NUMERIC}, #{buyer.userId:VARCHAR}, #{paymentOption:CHAR}, #{receiverName:VARCHAR}, #{receiverPhone:VARCHAR}, #{divyAddr:VARCHAR}, #{divyRequest:VARCHAR}, #{tranCode:CHAR}, SYSDATE, #{divyDate:DATE} )
mapper.select: SELECT tran_no , prod_no, buyer_id, payment_option, receiver_name, receiver_phone, dlvy_addr, dlvy_request, tran_status_code, order_date, dlvy_date FROM transaction WHERE tran_no = #{value}

SELECT sub.* FROM ( SELECT p.prod_name, t.tran_no , t.prod_no, t.buyer_id, t.payment_option, t.receiver_name, t.receiver_phone, t.dlvy_addr, t.dlvy_request, t.tran_status_code, t.order_date, t.dlvy_date, COUNT(*) OVER() as total_row, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (order by t.tran_no) as r FROM product p, transaction t, users u WHERE p.prod_no = t.prod_no AND u.user_id = t.buyer_id AND u.user_id = #{userId} order by t.tran_no ) sub WHERE sub.r >= #{search.startRowNum} AND sub.r <= #{search.endRowNum}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM( SELECT t.tran_no FROM transaction t ) countTable
